title: Dev2Prod - Offering rules aren't imported
content:
When you run a Dev2Prod import, an offering is imported, but the rules of the offering are not. 

Cause

A Set field based on routing definition rule is defined for the offering. 

During import, the data of the offering is imported first, and then the workflow. Because routing definitions can't be exported into a Dev2Prod package, during the workflow import, the routing definition defined in the rule can't be found and hence the workflow import is blocked. As a result, all rules of the offering are not imported. 

Solution

This is a limitation of the Dev2Prod functionality. To resolve this issue:

  1. Create the same routing definition in the target tenant (Administration > Routing Definitions > New).
  2. Rerun the import.
